Container.Name: CreativeWriter
Container.Overview: CreativeWriter is a powerful, AI-enhanced creative writing application for authors. Features include multi-AI provider support (OpenRouter, Gemini, Ollama), rich text editor with inline images, story structure management, dynamic codex system, and more. **IMPORTANT: This is a multi-container application.** For the best experience, install using Docker Compose Manager plugin. See the installation guide: https://github.com/MarcoDroll/creativewriter-public/blob/main/docs/unraid/README.md If installing manually, you also need: CouchDB, CreativeWriter App, Gemini Proxy, and Replicate Proxy containers on the same network.
Container.Description: AI-enhanced creative writing application for fiction authors. Supports OpenRouter, Google Gemini, and local Ollama models. Features rich text editing, story structure management, character codex, and more. RECOMMENDED: Install via Docker Compose Manager for easy setup of all required containers.
